description: This file defines a Python class 'Crawl4aiTools' that provides web crawling and content extraction functionalities using the 'crawl4ai' library. It includes methods for configuring the crawler, performing asynchronous crawling of single or multiple URLs, and processing the results to extract markdown or text content, with options for content filtering and pruning.

classes.name: Crawl4aiTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for crawling web pages and extracting content using the 'crawl4ai' library, with configurable options for content filtering, pruning, and output length.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the Crawl4aiTools with configurable parameters such as max content length, timeout, pruning options, and headless browsing.

methods.name: _build_config
methods.description: Constructs the crawler configuration dictionary based on current settings and optional search query, including content filtering strategies.

methods.name: crawl
methods.description: Performs crawling on a single URL or list of URLs, returning the extracted content or error message.

methods.name: _async_crawl
methods.description: Asynchronously crawls a single URL, processes the result to extract markdown or text content, and handles errors.
